## Descriptives in analysis sample

This report is limited to those age 65 and older, and either in HCAP or have a non-zero 2016 Core interview sampling weight (`inHcap==1 | (age65up==1 & nonzeroweight==1))`)

```{r}
n9763 <- readRDS(here::here("R_objects", "PMM_033.RDS")) |>  
  dplyr::filter(age65up == 1) 
  
n9763 |>
  haven::zap_label() |> 
  skimr::skim() |>
  dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(., 2)))
```
